    • Uses of BusConsumer in com.freedomotic.core

      Classes in com.freedomotic.core that implement BusConsumer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Autodiscovery
      Create Things on the fly using a template as a starting point.
      class  BehaviorManager
      Translates a generic request like 'turn on light 1' into a series of hardware commands like 'send to serial COM1 the string A01AON' using the mapping between abstract action -to-> concrete action defined in every environment object, for lights it can be something like 'turn on' -> 'turn on X10 light' This class is listening on channels: app.events.sensors.behavior.request.objects If a command (eg: 'turn on light1' or 'turn on all lights') is received on this channel the requested behavior is applied to the single object or all objects of the same type as described by the command parameters.
      class  JoinPlugin 
      class  SynchManager 
      class  TopologyManager
      Listens to topology related events and manages them, eventually throwing more specific events like "PersonEnterZone" if it's the case.

    • Uses of BusConsumer in com.freedomotic.nlp

      Classes in com.freedomotic.nlp that implement BusConsumer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CommandsNlpService
      Listen for free-form (natural language) text commands on channel "app.commands.interpreter.nlp" and using NLP tools execute the most similar command that the framework has in memory.
